name: Battle Checkers - war of heroes
description:
Original checkers follows the rules of "chapaev".

Download the game and participate in combat on the Board, destroy the exact impact the enemy army!

With this game, you will be able to play locally, against someone or against the computer. You will also be able to play against anyone in the world through Game Center.

Free version!!!:
- Games against computer
- Games against friend's
- Online games with Game Center
- Nice look and feel
